## API

### props

| props      | type             | required | default | description                                           |
| ---------- | ---------------- | -------- | ------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| position   | `String`         |          |         |                                                       |
| camera     | `Object`         |          |         | use `{center, zoom, bearing, pitch}` to decide a view |
| bounds     | `Array | Object` |          |         | use `bounds` to decide a view                         |
| flyOptions | `Object`         |          |         | flyTo options, `{duration, easing, etc...}`           |
